QuestData.Title: Slavery and Strife
QuestData.Description: We have their citadel, but they still have some of my people enslaved at the Sootstained Mines.$b$bWe have no one to spare, but you seem more than capable of handling a few ogres on your own.$b$bI ask that you release any enslaved Frostwolves you find there, and keep an eye out for Mulverick.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free 5 Frostwolf Slaves from the Sootstained Mining Camp.
QuestData.RewardText: Who are you, outsider? I saw you freeing some of my kin...
